{"id":344427157,"lang":"cpp","time":"2 years, 3 months","timestamp":1590406733,"status_display":"Time Limit Exceeded","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/344427157/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"N/A","code":"#include <iostream>     // std::cout\n#include <algorithm>    // std::max\nusing namespace std;\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    int max_fun(int a,int b){\n        if(a>=b)\n            return a;\n        return b;\n    }\n    int lengthOfLongestSubstring(string str) {\n        set <char > s;\n        int left =0;\n        int right =0;\n        int max_length=0;\n        while(right< str.size()){\n            char character =str[right];\n            if(s.find(character) != s.end()){\n                s.insert(character);\n                max_length =max_fun(max_length,s.size());\n                right ++;\n            }\n            else {\n                s.erase(character);\n                left++;\n            }\n        }\n        return max_length;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters"}
